title: Understanding the Editor Layout
text: In spreadsheets, rows are horizontal lines of data, and columns are vertical stacks. Each has headers, usually highlighted at the top or side.

title: Identifying the Rows and Columns
text: Click on the row or column headers to select them. Observe how the entire row or column becomes highlighted, indicating selection.

title: Exploring Drag and Drop Functionality
text: Most spreadsheet tools allow you to move data by pressing and holding the selected data, then dragging it to the desired position before releasing.
